To determine feasibility purify allogeneic CD8+ memory T-cells suitable clinical application determine safety maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) cell patient recurrent refractory hematolymphoid malignancy follow allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplant ( HCT ) . To assess donor specific chimerism designate time point treatment allogeneic CD8+ memory T-cells . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients undergo CD8+ memory T-cell infusion 10-20 minute .
